source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT   H.InvoiceAccountCode,  H.RouteCode, H.DistributorCode,L.*
FROM RD.SalesInvoiceLine L
INNER JOIN RD.SalesInvoiceHeader H ON
    L.TerritoryCode = H.TerritoryCode AND
    L.InvoiceNo = H.InvoiceNo AND
    L.SalesCategoryCode = H.SalesCategoryCode
Where  convert(varchar, L.InvoiceDate, 23) = convert(varchar, dateadd(Day,-1,getdate()), 23)
and L.BusinessUnit = 'HEMA' AND H.[Status] = 1

SELECT   H.DistributorCode, H.RouteCode As HRouteCode, H.ExecutiveCode as HExecCode  ,L.* 
FROM [RD].[CreditNoteLine] L
INNER JOIN [RD].[CreditNoteHeader] H ON
    L.TerritoryCode = H.TerritoryCode AND
    L.CreditNoteNo = H.CreditNoteNo AND
    L.SalesCategoryCode = H.SalesCategoryCode
Where  convert(varchar, L.CreditDate, 23) = convert(varchar, dateadd(Day,-1,getdate()), 23)
and L.BusinessUnit = 'HEMA' AND H.[Status] = 1

SELECT  H.RouteCode, H.DistributorCode,L.*
FROM [RD].SalesOrderLine L
INNER JOIN [RD].SalesOrderHeader H ON
    L.TerritoryCode = H.TerritoryCode AND
    L.OrderNo = H.OrderNo AND
    L.SalesCategoryCode = H.SalesCategoryCode
Where  convert(varchar, L.OrderDate, 23) = convert(varchar, dateadd(Day,-1,getdate()), 23)
and L.BusinessUnit = 'HEMA'

SELECT  * FROM RD.RouteDetail
where   BusinessUnit = 'HEMA' and [Status] = 1
and TerritoryCode <> ''

SELECT 
	--D.*,
	D.RecID,
	D.BusinessUnit,
	D.TerritoryCode,
	L.RouteCode,
	L.RetailerCode,
	D.ExecutiveCode,
	H.InvoiceDate,
	D.SalesCategoryCode,
	D.InvoiceNo,
	D.ProductCode,
	D.DiscountValue,
	D.FreeProductCode,
	D.FreeIssueValue,
	D.FreeIssueQty,
	D.FreeIssuePrecentage,
	T.ProductCriteria, 
	T.Qualifier1, 
	T.TradeScheme,
	convert(varchar,cast(((D.FreeIssueQty/T.TradeScheme) * T.Qualifier1) as int))+':'+convert(varchar,cast(D.FreeIssueQty as int)) as Slab,
 H.TradeSchemeRecID,
H.DiscountType
FROM RD.SalesInvoiceHeaderDiscount D
INNER JOIN RD.SalesInvoiceDiscount H on D.RecID = H.RecID  and D.FreeProductCode = H.DiscountedProductCode
LEFT JOIN RD.TradeSchemeDetail T on H.TradeSchemeRecID = T.RecID
LEFT JOIN RD.SalesInvoiceHeader L on
	L.InvoiceNo = D.InvoiceNo and
	L.SalesCategoryCode = D.SalesCategoryCode and
	L.TerritoryCode = D.TerritoryCode 
WHERE  convert(varchar, H.InvoiceDate, 23) = convert(varchar, dateadd(Day,-1,getdate()), 23) AND H.DiscountType = 'H'

SELECT 
	--D.*,
	D.RecID,
	D.BusinessUnit,
	D.TerritoryCode,
	H.RouteCode,
	L.RetailerCode,
	D.ExecutiveCode,
	D.SalesCategoryCode,
	D.InvoiceNo,
	D.InvoiceDate,
	'ALL' As DiscountCriteria,
	D.DiscountValue,
	D.DiscountQty,
	D.DiscountedProductCode,
	D.OriginalDiscountProduct,
	D.OriginalDiscountQty,
	D.OriginalDiscountValue,
	D.Price,
	D.Price * D.DiscountQty As FreeIssueValue,
	L.ProductCode, 
	T.Qualifier1, 
	T.TradeScheme,
	convert(varchar,cast(((D.DiscountQty/T.TradeScheme) * T.Qualifier1) as int))+':'+convert(varchar,cast(D.DiscountQty as int)) as Slab,
D.TradeSchemeRecID,
	D.DiscountType
FROM RD.SalesInvoiceDiscount D
INNER join RD.TradeSchemeDetail T on D.TradeSchemeRecID = T.RecID
LEFT join RD.SalesInvoiceLine L on
	L.InvoiceNo = D.InvoiceNo and
	L.SalesCategoryCode = D.SalesCategoryCode and
	L.TerritoryCode = D.TerritoryCode AND
	L.InvoiceLineNo = D.InvoiceLineNumber
LEFT JOIN RD.SalesInvoiceHeader H ON
	H.InvoiceNo = D.InvoiceNo and
	H.SalesCategoryCode = D.SalesCategoryCode and
	H.TerritoryCode = D.TerritoryCode
WHERE convert(varchar, D.InvoiceDate, 23) = convert(varchar, dateadd(Day,-1,getdate()), 23) AND D.DiscountType = 'L'
